title: I don't get notifications on Gmail of my outlook account
content:
I set on my pixel 3xl 4 email accounts.
In the Gmail one all is good... About the others I don't know... I am sure that I don't get email notifications on outlook account... Then I open the app and have plenty mail there...

All is set correctly (notifications on, no do not disturb).

I don't know what else should I do
